description: The Concept representing the Branded Drug or Clinical Drug Product.
The Concept representing the active ingredient within the drug product. Combination Drugs will have more than one record, one for each active ingredient.
The numeric value or amount of active ingredient contained within the drug product.
The Concept representing the Unit of measure for the amount of active ingredient in the drug product.
The concentration of the active ingredient contained within the drug product.
The Concept representing the Unit of measure for the concentration of the active ingredient.
The amount of total liquid (or other divisible product, such as ointment, gel, spray, etc.).
comment: Total liquid or divisible product amount.

description: The Concept representing the denominator unit for the concentration of active ingredient.
The number of units of Clinical Branded Drug or Quantified Clinical/Branded Drug contained in a box as dispensed to the patient.
comment: Box size as dispensed to the patient.

description: The date when the Concept was first recorded. Default value is 1-Jan-1970.
The date when the Concept became invalid.
Reason the concept was invalidated. Possible values are D (deleted), U (replaced with an update), or NULL when valid_end_date has the default value.
